original_text: But the people would not listen and they turned away. They put their hands over their ears, because they did not want to hear.
korean_text: 그들이 듣기를 싫어하여 등을 돌리며 듣지 아니하려고 귀를 막으며

sentences.original_text: But the people would not listen
They put their hands over their ears
because they did not want to hear
